title: 112_hr3800
content: The "Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012" extends fuel and ticket taxes funding the Airport and Airway Trust Fund until February 17, 2012. The effective date for these amendments is February 1, 2012. Additionally, the Act extends the expenditure authority of the Airport and Airway Trust Fund. The Revenue Code of 1986 is amended to change dates and include the Airport and Airway Extension Act of 2012. The effective date for these changes is February 1, 2012. Additionally, the Airport Improvement Program is extended with an authorization of appropriations until February 17, 2012. The appropriation Acts allow funds for fiscal year 2012 to be obligated until September 30, 2012. Various authorities are extended until February 18, 2012, including project grant authority and specific funding allocations. Various sections of the title are amended by changing dates from January 31, 2012, to February 17, 2012, and from April 30, 2012, to May 17, 2012. This includes amendments to sections 44303(b), 47107(s)(3), 47115(j), 47141(f), 49108, and 161 of the Vision 100--Century of Aviation Reauthorization Act. SEC. 6. FEDERAL AVIATION ADMINISTRATION OPERATIONS amended to allocate $3,692,555,464 from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012. SEC. 7. AIR NAVIGATION FACILITIES AND EQUIPMENT amended to allocate $1,044,541,913 from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012. SEC. 8. RESEARCH, ENGINEERING, AND DEVELOPMENT amended. Section 48102(a)(16) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to allocate $64,092,459 from October 1, 2011, to February 17, 2012. Section 41742(a)(2) of title 49, United States Code, is also amended to allocate $54,699,454 for the same period.
